org.openimaj.hardware.serial

Class SerialReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hardware.serial.SerialReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, jssc.SerialPortEventListener

    public class SerialReader
extends Object
implements jssc.SerialPortEventListener, Closeable
    An event listener that receives data from the serial port, buffers the data, parses the data then calls the listeners for every sentence parsed.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • fireDataReceived

        protected void fireDataReceived(String[] strings)
        Fire multiple events: one for each parsed string.
        Parameters:
        strings - The strings parsed from the parser.

      • setMaxBufferSize

        public void setMaxBufferSize(int maxSize)
        Set the size of the buffer to use. The buffer size must be larger than any expected data item that you are wanting to parse. If your sentences can be up to 128 bytes, then the buffer should be at least 128 bytes. It can be larger.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - The size of the buffer to use.
